name: node-red-contrib-cot2xtopo
description: This module parses 'live tracks' in network kmls from services such as CalTopo / SARTopo and converts the last coordinate in the live tracking folder to a position location information (pli) cursor-on-target (CoT) message to send to a Team Awareness Kit (TAK) Server or other TAK end users and parses a stream of CoT messages and sends them to CalTopo maps using their conenct key and position API
author: Paul Clifton
